subject: THE BRITISH FINANCE INTELLI
body:
THE BRITISH FINANCE INTELLIGENCE AGENCY
35 LANARK SQUARE, LONDON
FROM THE DESK OF GARY WINSTON,
Attention  
 
Dear Madam,
  My name is Gary Winston chief operating officer of the 
British finance intelligence agency
 this office has a mandate to recover unpaid debts
associated with NNPC contracts in Africa, Lottery fund, inheritance fund, loans and grants etc ranging from $1M-$50.5M owed to various beneficiaries and companies across the globe (Asia, Europe, USA, Africa, and Australia the Caribbeans)being the mandate given by the G8 MEMBER NATIONS WORLD INDUSTRIALIZED NATIONS AND, BACK BY THE ICPC IN HAGUE, AND THE WORLD BANK.
In the course of our investigation, your email address/particulars were shortlisted among the first individuals yet to be paid hence this message However, we received a petition today from your your  relation  that you are sick. According to her, you were sick of terminal sickness and life threatening in the USA  and, such  fund should be paid to her as the heir apparent. She has also submitted her Bank account details for the transfer of the funds to her.To avoid undue delay or paying the fund to wrong individual/beneficiary,
I have decided to contact you for confirmation. If I fail to hear from you
after 72 hours, it would be assumed that the petition of your  relation  is true and the fund will be paid to her without further delay.
Therefore, if you are still alive, reconfirm your particulars,
1. Address:______________________ ________
2. Nationality:____________
Date of Birth:________
3. Occupation:___________________ ________
4. Phone:_______
5. Copy of int'l passport or any scanned identity to prove your identity.
All submitted information will be treated strictly private and confidential and, duly processed for the release of the funds to you.
please respond as quickly as possibly and no third party .
 
thank you.
sincerely yours
GARY WINSTON
CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER
[This e-mail contains confidential information intended only for the addressee(s). Information in or attached to it may be privileged, confidential or protected by law. If you are not the addressee (or a person responsible for delivering this transmission to the addressee) you are strictly prohibited from reading, copying, disseminating or distributing it. If you have received this e-mail in error please delete it and any attachments from your system and destroy any print outs you may have made. Thank you.

subject: Re:    THE BRITISH FINANCE INTELLI
body:
Hello Gary Winston,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite surprising! I'm not aware of any unpaid debts or contracts associated with NNPC in Africa, Lottery fund, loans and grants etc. Also, I'm not sick and don't have any relatives who would claim such a thing.

I'm curious about how my email address ended up on your list of people yet to be paid. Could you please provide more details about this? 

Also, could you clarify the nature of these funds? Are they related to some kind of inheritance or something else?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Latoya
